articles.title: River Island owners draw up rescue plan for high street chain
articles.description: The clothing retailer, which trades from 230 shops and employs 5,500 people, is working with PwC on a formal restructuring plan amid tough trading conditions, Sky News learns.
articles.content:
The family behind River Island, the high street fashion retailer, is drawing up a radical rescue plan which could put significant numbers of stores and jobs at risk.
Sky News has learnt that the chain's owners have drafted in advisers from Pricewater... [2797 chars]

articles.title: TV tonight: the BBC opens a Billy Joel treasure trove
articles.description: An archival feast for fans of the legendary US singer-songwriter. Plus, a soft landing for Whovians as Ncuti Gatwa, Billie Piper, David Tennant and Karen Gillan feature in a documentary about the making of the show. Here’s what to watch this evening
articles.content:
Billy Joel at the BBC
8.40pm, BBC Two

articles.title: Country celebrates Eidul Azha today with call for unity, selflessness
articles.description: PM Shehbaz calls for remembering Palestinians "enduring ruthless and inhumane oppression and hunger".
articles.content:

articles.title: Rod Stewart cancels US gigs ahead of Glastonbury
articles.description: The 80-year-old 'Maggie May' singer says he's devastated to scrap the shows as he recovers from the flu.
articles.content:
He signed off "Sir Rod", along with a heartbreak emoji.
He also listed the four shows he was cancelling - in Las Vegas and Stateline, Nevada - as well as two he plans to reschedule in California.

articles.description: A new iOS 26 operating system that brings a major shuffle in the design language could make things exciting for WWDC attendees, both offline and online.

articles.title: Astatine-188: The heaviest proton emitter discovered
articles.description: For the first time in more than thirty years, the heaviest nucleus decaying via proton emission has been measured.
articles.content:
Proton emission is a rare form of radioactive decay in which the nucleus emits a proton, taking a step toward stability. The radioactive decay of atomic nuclei has been a cornerstone of nuclear physics since the inception of nuclear research.

articles.description: A nepo-baby before the term was even coined, the star was the son of legendary late footballer George Best, who attempted to kickstart his own career on Celebrity Love Island.
